description: Returns a list of field indexes listed in the field index policies of one or more log groups. For more information about field index policies, see PutIndexPolicy.

parameters.name: logGroupIdentifiers
parameters.description: An array containing the names or ARNs of the log groups that you want to retrieve field indexes for. (string) ---

nested_items.name: fieldIndexes
nested_items.description: An array containing the field index information.

nested_items.name: logGroupIdentifier
nested_items.description: If this field index appears in an index policy that applies only to a single log group, the ARN of that log group is displayed here.

nested_items.name: fieldIndexName
nested_items.description: The string that this field index matches.

nested_items.name: lastScanTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time that CloudWatch Logs scanned ingested log events to search for this field index to improve the speed of future CloudWatch Logs Insights queries that search for this field index.

nested_items.name: firstEventTime
nested_items.description: The time and date of the earliest log event that matches this field index, after the index policy that contains it was created.

nested_items.name: lastEventTime
nested_items.description: The time and date of the most recent log event that matches this field index.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. The token expires after 24 hours.
